source: TEXT_WARPINNGRIDANIA_ANTOINAUT_000_1<tab>Welcome, traveler. This is Gridania's humble inn, the Roost.
target: TEXT_WARPINNGRIDANIA_ANTOINAUT_000_1<tab>Welcome, traveler. This is Gridania's humble inn, the Roost.

source: TEXT_WARPINNGRIDANIA_ANTOINAUT_000_2<tab>I'm terribly sorry, but I cannot provide you a room without Mother Miounne's express permission.
target: TEXT_WARPINNGRIDANIA_ANTOINAUT_000_2<tab>I'm terribly sorry, but I cannot provide you a room without Mother Miounne's express permission.

source: TEXT_WARPINNGRIDANIA_Q1_000_1<tab>What would you like to do?
target: TEXT_WARPINNGRIDANIA_Q1_000_1<tab>Что вы хотели бы сделать?

source: TEXT_WARPINNGRIDANIA_A1_000_1<tab>Ask about the Roost.
target: TEXT_WARPINNGRIDANIA_A1_000_1<tab>Спросить про Насест.

source: TEXT_WARPINNGRIDANIA_A1_000_2<tab>Nothing.
target: TEXT_WARPINNGRIDANIA_A1_000_2<tab>Ничего.

source: TEXT_WARPINNGRIDANIA_ANTOINAUT_000_3<tab>For many years, visitors to our fair city have flocked to our establishment, certain of a warm welcome.
target: TEXT_WARPINNGRIDANIA_ANTOINAUT_000_3<tab>For many years, visitors to our fair city have flocked to our establishment, certain of a warm welcome.

source: TEXT_WARPINNGRIDANIA_ANTOINAUT_000_4<tab>Adventurers are as migratory birds, needing a place to rest their weary wings.
target: TEXT_WARPINNGRIDANIA_ANTOINAUT_000_4<tab>Adventurers are as migratory birds, needing a place to rest their weary wings.

source: TEXT_WARPINNGRIDANIA_ANTOINAUT_000_5<tab>Regretfully, owing to the Calamity and the shortages that followed, we have been forced to impose a strict entry policy, whereby only trusted friends of Gridania may enjoy our hospitality. Our limited resources will allow no more.
target: TEXT_WARPINNGRIDANIA_ANTOINAUT_000_5<tab>Regretfully, owing to the Calamity and the shortages that followed, we have been forced to impose a strict entry policy, whereby only trusted friends of Gridania may enjoy our hospitality. Our limited resources will allow no more.

source: TEXT_WARPINNGRIDANIA_ANTOINAUT_000_6<tab>To wit, if you wish to make use of our facilities, we ask that you contribute to the nation's recovery by aiding our community.
target: TEXT_WARPINNGRIDANIA_ANTOINAUT_000_6<tab>To wit, if you wish to make use of our facilities, we ask that you contribute to the nation's recovery by aiding our community.

source: TEXT_WARPINNGRIDANIA_ANTOINAUT_000_10<tab>What can we do for you <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((this evening)) ((this morning)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((today)) ((this evening)) /var>)) /var>?
target: TEXT_WARPINNGRIDANIA_ANTOINAUT_000_10<tab>Чем мы можем быть <var 08 E3E90C0D ((полезны для вас <var 08 E3E90C05 ((в этот вечер)) ((в это утро)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((сегодня полезны для вас)) ((полезны для вас в этот вечер)) /var>)) /var>?

source: TEXT_WARPINNGRIDANIA_Q2_000_1<tab>What would you like to do?
target: TEXT_WARPINNGRIDANIA_Q2_000_1<tab>Что вы хотели бы сделать?

source: TEXT_WARPINNGRIDANIA_A2_000_1<tab>Retire to an inn room.
target: TEXT_WARPINNGRIDANIA_A2_000_1<tab><var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((Переночевать в гостинице)) ((Зайти в гостиницу)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((Зайти в гостиницу)) ((Переночевать в гостинице)) /var>)) /var>.

source: TEXT_WARPINNGRIDANIA_A2_000_2<tab>Ask about <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>resting<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
target: TEXT_WARPINNGRIDANIA_A2_000_2<tab>Узнать больше об <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>отдыхе<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.

source: TEXT_WARPINNGRIDANIA_A2_000_3<tab>Ask about inn rules.
target: TEXT_WARPINNGRIDANIA_A2_000_3<tab>Узнать правила гостиницы.

source: TEXT_WARPINNGRIDANIA_A2_000_4<tab>Ask about the Roost.
target: TEXT_WARPINNGRIDANIA_A2_000_4<tab>Спросить про Насест.

source: TEXT_WARPINNGRIDANIA_A2_000_5<tab>Nothing.
target: TEXT_WARPINNGRIDANIA_A2_000_5<tab>Ничего.

source: TEXT_WARPINNGRIDANIA_ANTOINAUT_000_11<tab>We hope you have a pleasant stay.
target: TEXT_WARPINNGRIDANIA_ANTOINAUT_000_11<tab>Надеемся, отдых придётся вам по душе.

source: TEXT_WARPINNGRIDANIA_ANTOINAUT_000_12<tab>We here at the Roost believe that you'll find your adventures much more rewarding if you face them well rested. Feel free to retire to one of our homey rooms whenever you find yourself in Gridania.
target: TEXT_WARPINNGRIDANIA_ANTOINAUT_000_12<tab>We here at the Roost believe that you'll find your adventures much more rewarding if you face them well rested. Feel free to retire to one of our homey rooms whenever you find yourself in Gridania.

source: TEXT_WARPINNGRIDANIA_SYSTEM_000_13<tab>Entering an inn room grants a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>resting<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> status. This indicates that you are gradually accumulating a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>rested bonus<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. Should you log out from inside an inn room, the process will continue while you are offline.
target: TEXT_WARPINNGRIDANIA_SYSTEM_000_13<tab>Вход в гостиницу даёт статус <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>отдыха<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. Когда он активен, вы постепенно накапливаете <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>бонус отдыха<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. Этот процесс продолжится даже тогда, когда вы выйдете из сети, будучи в гостинице.

source: TEXT_WARPINNGRIDANIA_SYSTEM_000_14<tab>While a rested bonus is in effect, experience points earned through combat, synthesis, and gathering are increased by 50%.
target: TEXT_WARPINNGRIDANIA_SYSTEM_000_14<tab>Во время действия бонуса отдыха вы будете получать на 50% больше очков опыта от битвы, ремесла и собирательства.

source: TEXT_WARPINNGRIDANIA_SYSTEM_000_15<tab>When you gain experience, your rested bonus will decrease proportionally.
target: TEXT_WARPINNGRIDANIA_SYSTEM_000_15<tab>При получении опыта ваш бонус отдыха будет пропорционально уменьшаться.

source: TEXT_WARPINNGRIDANIA_SYSTEM_000_16<tab>Once your accumulated rested bonus disappears completely, the amount of experience you gain will revert to normal.
target: TEXT_WARPINNGRIDANIA_SYSTEM_000_16<tab>Как только вы тем самым потратите весь бонус отдыха, количество получаемого опыта вернётся в норму.

source: TEXT_WARPINNGRIDANIA_ANTOINAUT_000_17<tab>As a courtesy to your fellow guests, we ask that you refrain from making loud noises or otherwise causing a disturbance during your stay with us.
target: TEXT_WARPINNGRIDANIA_ANTOINAUT_000_17<tab>As a courtesy to your fellow guests, we ask that you refrain from making loud noises or otherwise causing a disturbance during your stay with us.

source: TEXT_WARPINNGRIDANIA_SYSTEM_000_18<tab>Synthesis, repairs, and materia melding cannot be performed inside inn rooms.
target: TEXT_WARPINNGRIDANIA_SYSTEM_000_18<tab>В гостиницах нельзя заниматься ремеслом, починкой и вставкой материи.

source: TEXT_WARPINNGRIDANIA_ANTOINAUT_000_19<tab>Visitors to our fair city invariably seek lodgings at the Roost, keen to sample our famous hospitality.
target: TEXT_WARPINNGRIDANIA_ANTOINAUT_000_19<tab>Visitors to our fair city invariably seek lodgings at the Roost, keen to sample our famous hospitality.

source: TEXT_WARPINNGRIDANIA_ANTOINAUT_000_20<tab>Adventurers, you see, are as migratory birds in need of a place to rest their weary wings.
target: TEXT_WARPINNGRIDANIA_ANTOINAUT_000_20<tab>Adventurers, you see, are as migratory birds in need of a place to rest their weary wings.

source: TEXT_WARPINNGRIDANIA_ANTOINAUT_000_21<tab>Whether you desire a quiet moment for reflection, or to forget your burdens in a soft bed, I'm confident our rooms will meet with your approval.
target: TEXT_WARPINNGRIDANIA_ANTOINAUT_000_21<tab>Whether you desire a quiet moment for reflection, or to forget your burdens in a soft bed, I'm confident our rooms will meet with your approval.

source: TEXT_WARPINNGRIDANIA_ANTOINAUT_000_22<tab>Adventurers are by their nature a restless breed, loath to see so much as a single moment go to waste, but know that repose is essential to one's continued well-being.
target: TEXT_WARPINNGRIDANIA_ANTOINAUT_000_22<tab>Adventurers are by their nature a restless breed, loath to see so much as a single moment go to waste, but know that repose is essential to one's continued well-being.
